Brussels sprouts and its effects on breast cancer

Summary generated using: $shovel3 query.concatConclusions 'breast cancer brussels sprouts site:ncbi.nlm.nih.gov' 40 includeReference=True
  • We document an unexpected effect of DIM on cell proliferation, which is to stimulate growth by inducing the ERÎ± signaling pathway. Importantly, this proliferative effect of DIM happens with potentially physiological concentrations that can be provided by the diet or by taking caplet supplements.
